sentence.text: Although open hERG1 channels did not interact as strongly with Î²<sub>1</sub> integrins as did closed channels, current flow through hERG1 channels was necessary to activate the integrin-dependent phosphorylation of Tyr<sup>397</sup> in focal adhesion kinase (transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway) in both normal and cancer cells.

entity.text: transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway
